mapper.select: select cr.id,cr.note_content,u1.name as create_by,cr.create_time, u2.name as edit_by,cr.edit_time,cr.edit_flag,cr.contacts_id from tbl_contacts_remark cr join tbl_user u1 on cr.create_by=u1.id left join tbl_user u2 on cr.edit_by=u2.id where contacts_id=#{contactsId}
